revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Iron Ruins |image = [[File:Iron Ruins.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Iron Ruins. |tokens = 1,920,000 |location = Northwest of Giants Bed }}
<!--T:2--> '''Iron Ruins''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 31,507,840 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Bronzong.png|40px]] Bronzong || rowspan=8 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Duraludon.png|40px]] Duraludon |- | [[File:Copperajah.png|40px]] Copperajah |- | [[File:Corviknight.png|40px]] Corviknight |- | [[File:Perrserker.png|40px]] Perrserker |- | [[File:Bisharp.png|40px]] Bisharp |- | [[File:Ferrothorn.png|40px]] Ferrothorn |- | [[File:Excadrill.png|40px]] Excadrill |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Metagross.png|50px]] Metagross || <center>149,662,240 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Registeel.png|50px]] '''Registeel*''' || <center>157,539,200 |} '''*Note:''' Must have made progress in [[Questlines#The Ancient Golems|The Ancient Golems]] Questline to unlock.
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.87% || 36.66% || 31.60% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Grey Shard}} || N/A || 20.21% || 21.38% || 26.28% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || N/A || 1.35% || 1.77% || 3.51% |}
<!--T:9--> {{Galar Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #8 - Galar^a]] </translate>
